home.paragraph1: We provide consulting, design, installation, and industrial maintenance solutions with over 25 years of experience.
home.paragraph2: We focus on optimizing equipment efficiency and ensuring proper operation with services tailored to each need.

aboutUs.paragraph-1: We are a company specializing in the industrial production sector,
aboutUs.paragraph-2: offering a wide range of services to support and enhance our clients' operations.
aboutUs.whatWeDo-description: Pre-project consultancy, equipment design and assembly, maintenance programs, and repairs for operational efficiency.
aboutUs.ourExperience-description: With over 25 years of expertise, we deliver personalized, high-quality solutions for industrial maintenance and facility management.
aboutUs.ourCommitment-description: We are committed to offering personalized, high-quality solutions tailored to each client's specific needs.

maintenance.header1: At Services JMK, we provide industrial maintenance solutions to ensure the optimal performance of your machinery. We offer two types of maintenance tailored to your company's needs:
maintenance.header3: maintenance to restore equipment in case of breakdowns.
maintenance.preventive-text: We perform inspections, adjustments, and key component replacements to reduce the risk of unexpected failures. With scheduled maintenance, we extend the lifespan of your equipment and enhance operational efficiency.
maintenance.corrective-text: We respond quickly to unexpected failures, diagnosing and resolving breakdowns to minimize downtime. Our technical team applies effective solutions to restore your machinery's operation as soon as possible.

preventive-section.description: We perform inspections, adjustments, and key component replacements to reduce the risk of unexpected failures. With scheduled maintenance, we extend the lifespan of your equipment and enhance operational efficiency.

corrective-section.description: We respond quickly to unexpected failures, diagnosing and resolving breakdowns to minimize downtime. Our technical team applies effective solutions to restore your machinery's operation as soon as possible.
